## JsPlumbListOptions.deriveAnchor property

Optional function to use to get an anchor spec when parking a connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deriveAnchor?: (edge: SupportedEdge, index: number, ep: Endpoint, conn: Connection) => AnchorSpec;
```
